response.overview: For 2025, Red Bull Hardline returns to Machynlleth in Wales, UK, for what is one of the world's toughest downhill mountain bike races. Riders push their limits to conquer what is known as one of the world's toughest part-downhill, part-freeride mountain bike races. 32 riders will push their limits to conquer a brutal course with massive jumps, drops and technical challenges.  Since its inception, world-class trail builder Dan Atherton has levelled up the jumps, gaps and sections, creating a more intense and extreme track for the riders to tackle year on year. Unlike any other MTB course, the Red Bull Hardline UK track borrows elements from motocross and BMX, so as well as speed and stamina, riders will lean heavily on their freeride, dirt jump, and big air skills (think the iconic Road Gap, and over 55ft of airtime).
response.tagline: For 2025, Red Bull Hardline returns to Machynlleth in Wales, UK, for what is one of the world's toughest downhill mountain bike races. Riders push their limits to conquer a brutal course with massive jumps, drops and technical challenges.
response.title: Red Bull Hardline UK
